title: 为什么我的砍树MOD砍一棵树要很久啊
author: 天天天590
txt_content: 我发现树越大砍得就越久。修改哪个配置文件啊？求助额                            +QQ909517489 我发整合包过去给你改

replies.author: ONI-MIKO-X
replies.txt_content:
# [Global] When true, the log break speed is equal to original break speed / (tree height * 2)
        # When false, the original break speed is multiplied by the breakSpeedModifier value [default: true]
        B:treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed=false
把这个配置修改一下

ONI-MIKO-X 发表于 2013-12-30 00:56 
# [Global] When true, the log break speed is equal to original break speed / (tree height  ...
把楼上写得那个false改成true

replies.author: ONI-MIKO-X
replies.txt_content:
164400720 发表于 2013-12-30 01:03 
把楼上写得那个false改成true
我想说的是，一改成true，那砍树时间=总高度*砍一个木头的时间/2
